text: Levites Omitted in the Census. Now the Levites were not enrolled by their ancestral tribe with the others.

and moreover the king’s servants have come to pay their respects to our lord, King David, saying, ‘May your God make Solomon’s name more famous than your name, his throne greater than your throne!’ And the king in his bed did homage.
Hadad died and Samlah of Masrekah succeeded him as king.
to build pagan altars and temples and shrines, to sacrifice swine and unclean animals,
my spirit rejoices in God my savior.
Jesus saw Nathanael coming toward him and said of him, “Here is a true Israelite. There is no duplicity in him.”
